body: Argos has warned parents to stop using certain Mamas & Papas car seats because of fears they may not protect children during a crash.   Related: Ikea recalls bat cape costume due to 'risk of strangulation'    The retailer issued an urgent recall for the products after tests suggested the car seat could crack in a collision.  The models concerned are: Mamas & Papas Mercury Group 1 Black (Argos catalogue number 297/7526); Mamas & Papas Mercury Group 1 Grey (Argos catalogue number 411/9100); Mamas & Papas Mercury Group 1-2-3 Black (Argos catalogue number 305/6037); Mamas & Papas Mercury Group 1, 2, 3 Grey (Argos catalogue number 397/9530) Mamas & Papas Mercury Group 2-3 Black and Grey (Argos catalogue number 245/4829). Argos said in a statement: “If you have purchased any of the above seats, you should immediately stop using the product and return the car seat to your local Argos store for a full refund. We wish to thank you for your cooperation and apologise for any inconvenience caused by this recall.”
webTitle: Argos recalls Mamas & Papas child car seats
